name: Dragon on the Move
description: A statue inspired by a mythical storybook dragon, it rests with wings lowered and eyes focused, as if poised to strike.\nInteract with the Dragon on the Move by sitting on its back. This triggers its internal mechanism, causing the eyes to open, the wings to flap, and the tail to sway, as if signaling the passenger on its back â€“ "Hold on tight. We're about to soar!"
